item.title: Kubernetes Debugging
item.description: Kubernetes debugging Overview Basic flow to debug a problem accessing an application deployed on Kubernetes

item.title: Shellscript Notes
item.description: Commonly used # Check if variable contains mystring if [[ $var == *mystring* ]]; then # The double closed brackets are essential for wildcard match echo "it does"; fi # Split on ":" and get 1st echo "docker-image:0.1" | cut -d ":" -f1 # returns docker-image # Find and replace all via pipe echo "Hello I'm Dom" | sed 's/Dom/<void>/g' # "/" could be any char # Redirect stdout and stderr to the void .

item.title: Setting up a Hugo Blog
item.description: Hugo is a Go based, static site generator. It has some impressive benchmarking figures, a huge catalog of impressive themes and means I don’t have to write HTML.
